title: Two Sum
objectives: Recognize when value-pair problems map to complements
recognitionCues: Ask: can I store prior info to find complement?

approaches.name: Hash Map
approaches.intuition: Use a map to store numbers and their indices
approaches.whenToUse: When finding pairs with a specific sum
